article_text:
Fayetteville, NC (28302)

Today

Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 89F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

Clear to partly cloudy. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 64F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: Paige Rentz

og.description: As flu season approaches, public health officials are urging residents not to wait to get vaccinated from the potentially deadly, and definitely miserable, virus.
og.title: Free flu shots offered Tuesday
